transArray.content:
Facilities: The facilities are quite intelligent, but I don’t quite understand why the Huazhuhui machine at the front desk has to be handled by the waiter every time. The switch beside the bed was unclear, so I pressed it randomly.
Hygiene: The bathroom has a bad smell, but other than that it's okay
Environment: The parking space is shared with the park next to it. It is enough for parking, but it is a bit troublesome to have to say something every time you come in and out.
Service: The people at the front desk are very nice, but it’s best not to rush customers to write positive reviews.

The night with stars will not be dark, the sea with sky will be blue, the life with dreams will be full of sunshine, and with your days, our work will be more meaningful. Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. However, we were not able to get your full score, which proves that we still have shortcomings. We hope that you can see our efforts next time you stay. We will continue to work hard to provide you with better services. For a comfortable and convenient check-in experience, all the hotel staff look forward to meeting you every time and wish you success in your work! Manager: Zhang Minghui
